briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of NKTR-181 in Opioid-Naive Subjects With Low Back Pain
officialTitle: A Phase 3 Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety, and Tolerability of NKTR-181 in Opioid-Naive Subjects With Moderate to Severe Chronic Low Back Pain

interventions.name: Placebo to match NKTR-181 BID tablets

summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether a new opioid molecule, NKTR-181, is effective for the relief of moderate to severe chronic low back pain as compared to a placebo.

primaryOutcome.measure: The Change in Weekly (ie, 7-day Average) Pain Score at the End of Double-blind, Randomized Treatment Period, Relative to the Weekly Score at the End of Titration (Double-blind Baseline)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 Weeks of randomized double blinded period
